suncertify.db
Class Locker

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--suncertify.db.Locker
class Locker
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a locker which can be used as record lock or db lock.

Constructor Summary
(package private) Locker()
           
 
Method Summary
 boolean isLocked()
          Returns true if the locker has been locked, or false if otherwise.
 boolean isQueueEmpty()
          Returns true if the waiting queue is empty, or false if threre are threads wating for this locker.
 void lock()
          Lock this locker.
 void unLock()
          Unlock this locker.

Constructor Detail

Locker

Locker()
Method Detail

isQueueEmpty

public boolean isQueueEmpty()
Returns true if the waiting queue is empty, or false if threre are threads wating for this locker.
Returns:
boolean true if waiting queue is empty, or false if otherwise.

isLocked

public boolean isLocked()
Returns true if the locker has been locked, or false if otherwise.
Returns:
boolean

lock

public void lock()
Lock this locker. If the locker has been locked then put the current thread to the waiting queue and wait for being notified.

unLock

public void unLock()
Unlock this locker. If the locker belongs to the current thread, then release it. Otherwise do nothing.
